headline: System Admin at U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE)
summary:
Professional Profile: Goal driven, creative professional with training in the areas of computer software and hardware. Including assembly, maintenance and repair. Strong achievements in the area of leadership, customer service and organization.

Specialties: computer hardware,  computer skills, database administration,  dell computers,  dns,  ftp,  hp servers,  instruction,  lan,  laptop computers,  microsoft access,  microsoft excel,  microsoft windows,  microsoft windows 2000,  microsoft windows 3.1,  microsoft windows nt,  microsoft word,  networking,  operating systems,  optimization,  pc maintenance,  peripherals,  printers,  programming,  protocols,  smtp,  software support,  sql,  tcp/ip,  technician,  vista,  vpn,  wan,  web site production,

positions.description: Design and managing networked systems and devices. Network infrastructure maintenance and security.
positions.title: Jr. Network/Systems Administrator

positions.description: IMAC Technician. Part of the IMAC team at the Credit Suisse account. Disconnecting and Reconnecting PC's. Installing PC's and peripherals for new users and/or current users. (Adds) Upgrading or swapping out PC's/monitors, making sure all peripherals and networks attached work properly.
positions.title: IMAC Technician
